page.title: 13MEDIA IN TRELAWNYD
page.content: The Liverpool Daily Post provides the main source for local news. It is read regularly, in nearly half of the homes. The paper is printed in Liverpool. and carries news of all events along the North Wales coast. Only Births, Deaths, Marriages, notices are printed in the welsh language. The Rhyl Journal, a weekly newspaper, is even more popular with the people. This provides stories and photographs of events that are held in the area. The sotories are written in Rhyl, but the paper is printed in Oswestry on Wednesday. The new radio station from Mold, Radio Clwyd, is not very well supported. It iis mainly listened to for its early morning news, traffic and weather notices. Radio Cymru, has a higher listening figure. the new television channel is S.4.C.
